forum.content:
So no matter what you study in the UK or the U.S. These are the daily work ull be dealing with, it's either reading or writing thousands words of paper or u die.
For those who wish to study abroad and in need of enhancing their skills, please start reading something in English. Anything would be good, Newyork times Wall Street journals, The Economist ~~ whatever~~ even comics would be great. Don't ask how to improve before you pick up one thing and start reading it. Or else it'd be too late to start when u land to a foreign country.
forum.title: No short cut but read
